  • org.apache.storm.cassandra.trident.stateにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.trident.stateのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    BaseQueryFunction 
    BaseStateUpdater 
    QueryFunction 
    State
    There’s 3 different kinds of state: non-transactional: ignores commits, updates are permanent. no rollback. a cassandra incrementing state would be like this repeat-transactional: idempotent as long as all batches for a txid are identical opaque-transactional: the most general kind of state. updates are always done based on the previous version of the value if the current commit = latest stored commit Idempotent even if the batch for a txid can change.
    StateFactory 
    StateUpdater
